comments.body: Note, it's better if changelogs reflect what was changed from the POV of the user.  For instance, fixed a traceback when storage options were unset in the initial configuration.  (I don't know if that's actually what is happening here, it's just an example ;-)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +0,4 @@bugfixes:
- ibm_storage - Added a check for null fields in ibm_storage utils module.
